casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

October, 1978

(October 18, 1973) In the Matter of Richard J. Adams, Respondent, v. New York State Civil Service Commission, Appellant.

Judgment unanimously affirmed, with costs. (See Matter of Wolff v, Hudson, 285 N. Y. 197.) (Appeal from judgment of Seneca Trial Term, reinstating petitioner in article 78 proceeding.) Present — Del Vecchio, J. P., Marsh, Cardamone, Simons and Henry, JJ.
